name: Raucous Raccard
description:
For the Ludum Dare 41 Challange

Use the tickets to help Raccard reach the Dumpster!

Move = Moves Raccard horizontally at a medium pace.

Jump = Causes Raccard to jump and stops horizontal movement

Leap = Causes Raccard to jump at arc

Dive = Moves Raccard horizontally at a fast pace and slight vertical jump (best for air movement)

Slide =  Moves Raccard horizontally even faster but drops down quicker (best for platform movement)

Rabies = Makes Raccard invincible to nets and destroys pet control
